Job Title: Lead Software Engineer - ML Infrastructure

Location: San Francisco, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
At DeepScribe, we are bringing the joy of care back to medicine by helping AI and healthcare professionals work in harmony. Today, we are leveraging ambient AI to automate documentation — allowing clinicians to focus on providing care, not documenting it. Trained using one of the world’s largest databases of patient conversations, DeepScribe empowers providers by transforming patient conversations into fully customizable, detailed clinical notes.

We are seeking a Lead ML Infrastructure Engineer to spearhead the development of our core ML training, inference, and evaluation platforms. This role involves building robust infrastructure to power our AI-driven clinical documentation models, and crafting tools for rapid model development and deployment. There is a people management opportunity for the right candidate.

Responsibilities

You’ll lead the development of our ML infrastructure to support the development of our in-house LLM for clinical documentation. You’ll be responsible for the reliability, performance, and security of our training data pipelines. You’ll be responsible for building our core inference infrastructure. You’ll partner across product engineering teams to build production systems at scale that power the products our customers use every day. You’ll leverage industry best practices that will improve DeepScribe’s customer-facing AI models that our customers rely on. 

Requirements

You have 5+ years experience in building and scaling performant software infrastructureYou have a track record of deploying ML models and and have familiarity of the full lifecycle of model developmentYou’re an effective team player and communicator, and are able to work across functions to find effective solutionsYou have experience mentoring engineers across teams, including other senior engineers

Additional information

Perks and benefits

$150,000 to $250,000 annual salary

Meaningful equity stake in the company

Flexible PTO

Work from home stipend

Medical, Dental, Vision, 401K and other benefits are also offered

About The Team

At DeepScribe, we value trust, teamwork, and transparency, and we’re dedicated to promoting diversity and equity in the workforce through inclusive hiring practices. Candidates with backgrounds that are underrepresented in the technology industry are encouraged to apply.

In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required eligibility verification form upon hire.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
